item.title: The granularity of inquisitive and truthmaker content
item.description: Aim Compare hyperintensional frameworks from a logical perspective.   Sedlár (2019), Pascucci & Sedlár (2023) TOC Hyperintensionality Logic Comparison Outlook Hyperintensionality Hyperintensional contexts are simply contexts which do not respect logical equivalence. Cresswell 'Hyperintensional logic' (1975)   A hyperintensional concept draws a distinction between necessarily equivalent contents. Berto & Nolan in the SEP (2021) Def. \(O\) is hyperintensional iff \[ \phi\dashv\vdash\psi\nRightarrow O(\phi)\dashv\vdash O(\psi) \] Failure of substitutivity Non-congruential operator Questions (Ciardelli, Groenendijk, Roelofsen 2018) \(?
